other_tests.findings: The appendix is enlarged, hyperemic, and fluid-filled, measuring up to 1.2 cm. There is associated severe right lower quadrant fat stranding. Mild bibasilar dependent atelectasis without pleural or pericardial effusion. Normal findings in the liver, pancreas, spleen, adrenals, kidneys, stomach, small bowel, colon, rectum, urinary bladder, and reproductive organs. No evidence of drainable fluid collection or extraluminal air, and no abdominal aortic aneurysm or significant lymphadenopathy.
